## Welcome to our blog! In each of our posts, we'll walk you through our approach to identifying the best model to predict student's scores. 

### You can learn more about the data and the variables we used in our post titled, *"Shoe Me What You're Working With"*. Yes, the typo was intentional because humor is the only thing keeping us going, currently. 

### Our second post, titled *"Old faithful, Meet the Neighbors, and Lost in the Forest"* describes each of our models, and identifies the best fitting model.
